concept.title: Bearing Lubrication Schedule
concept.shortdesc: Regular maintenance schedule and procedures for wheel bearing lubrication.

section.title: Maintenance Interval
section.p: Wheel bearing maintenance should be performed every three to four months.

section.title: Maintenance Process
section.p:
The complete maintenance procedure includes:
Removing the wheels
Removing all old grease
Thoroughly cleaning hubs and bearings with kerosene
Repacking hubs and bearings with clean grease
Readjusting bearing settings
